tool_description: Calculates comprehensive vendor scores by combining capability, experience, qualification, financial, and reference assessments with customizable weightings.

vendor_ids.description: List of vendor IDs to score and compare

scoring_methodology.description: Scoring methodology: weighted_average, best_fit, or conservative

error_messages: Insufficient vendors: At least 2 vendor IDs must be provided for comparison
Invalid weight values: All weight parameters must be between 0 and 1
Weight sum error: All weights must sum to 1.0 (Â±0.01 tolerance)
Invalid scoring methodology: Must be one of [weighted_average, best_fit, conservative]
Vendor assessment data missing: One or more vendors lack required assessment data
Invalid threshold score: Must be between 0 and 100
usage: Provide vendor_ids for comparison. Customize weights based on evaluation priorities. Set minimum_threshold_score to filter qualifying vendors.

vendor_rankings.description: Vendor IDs ranked by overall score (highest to lowest)

vendor_scores.description: Overall scores corresponding to ranked vendor list

qualified_vendors.description: Vendor IDs meeting minimum threshold score

score_breakdown_summary.description: Summary of scoring methodology and key differentiators

top_performer_analysis.description: Analysis of why top-ranked vendors performed best
